comments:
Build ID: M20070212-1330

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Make a Java class
2. Right click it, Web Services -> Create Web Service
3. Click Next in the pop up dialog


More information:
This is the error I get. The class only has 1 method that returns a String (no input). I have googled it and saw this was a bug 2 years ago.

IWAB0019E Error in getting method from Java bean.
